Issue Tracker is a project management to: Issue Tracker is a project management tool. It helps teams organize, track, and manage their projects and issues in a simple and efficient way.
How do I create an account?: How do I create an account?
You can create an account by clicking th: You can create an account by clicking the 'Sign Up' button in the top navigation bar. You'll need to provide an email address and create a password.
Yes, Issue Tracker is completely free to: Yes, Issue Tracker is completely free to use as it's an open-source project. You can even download the source code and host it yourself.
Can I contribute to the project?: Can I contribute to the project?
Absolutely! Issue Tracker is open-source: Absolutely! Issue Tracker is open-source and contributions are welcome. Check out our GitHub repository to get started.
How do I report bugs or request features: How do I report bugs or request features?
You can report bugs or request features: You can report bugs or request features by opening an issue on our GitHub repository. We appreciate your feedback and contributions!
What technologies does Issue Tracker use: What technologies does Issue Tracker use?
Issue Tracker is built with Next.js, Typ: Issue Tracker is built with Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and uses a PostgreSQL database. It leverages the latest features of Next.js App Router for optimal performance.
